useUnnoticed.name: Use Unnoticed
useUnnoticed.hint: Use 'Unnoticed' rather than 'Undetected' when the stealth initiative check beats the target's perception DC and initiative. combatants unnoticed by all PCs will not get visibility automatically toggled on when using that option. This be treated as 'Undetected' when talking to PF2e Visioner

removeGmHidden.name: Toggle on GM-Hidden combatants at Combat Start
removeGmHidden.hint: Combatant tokens whose visibility as been toggled off with token HUD will be toggled on. Any stealth vs perception results for those tokens will have had the appropriate conditions applied.

raiseShields.name: Raise PC shields when Defending
raiseShields.hint: Requires PCs to have held shields and have the Defend exploration activity active.
raiseShields.needsHeldShield: {actor} must have a shield equipped to {activity}.

autorollSpellDamage.name: Autoroll spell damage
autorollSpellDamage.hint: Only for non-attack spells that have a Roll Damage button when the card is initially created.

rage.name: Enrage Barbarians at combat start
rage.hint: Requires the 'Quick-Tempered' feat and 'Rage' action. 'Rage' action also needs a Self-Applied Effect in order to be automated

requireActivity.name: Require 'Avoid Notice' exploration activity
requireActivity.hint: PCs are required to set the 'Avoid Notice' exploration activity active to hide at combat start. If disabled, PCs instead need to use stealth for initiative.
requireActivity.error: {actor} needs to use {action} if wanting to hide at combat start.

strict.name: Strict Mode
strict.hint: Not recommended, likely won't respond to any bug reports related to something showing up that shouldn't have. Require avoiding tokens to have explicit cover or concealment conditions from observing tokens in order to become hidden or undetected from them.

noSummary.name: Disable chat card summaries
noSummary.hint: Will skip updating the initiative card with stealth results

hideFromAllies.name: Apply stealth results to allies
hideFromAllies.hint: If enabled, stealth will be applied against both allied and non-allied tokens

visibilityHandler.name: Visibility Handler
visibilityHandler.best: Use the worst degree-of-success (favor the seekers)
visibilityHandler.worst: Use the best degree-of-success (favor the sneakers)

computeCover.name: Compute Cover at Combat Start
computeCover.hint: Use visibility module to automatically compute cover between tokens using stealth for initiative and non-allied Tokens. It is only used for this check

clearStealth.name: Clear stealth from selected tokens
clearStealth.hint: Remove hidden, undetected, and unnoticed statuses from selected tokens.

clearPartyStealth.name: Clear stealth from the party
clearPartyStealth.hint: Remove hidden, undetected, and unnoticed statuses from the party.

clearPartyStealthAfterCombat.name: Clear Stealth from Party after combat
clearPartyStealthAfterCombat.hint: Will remove stealth conditions from party tokens on the current scene when combat is ended

clearMovement.name: Clear movement history at turn end
clearMovement.hint: Foundry v13 only. Automatically clears the movement history from the active token when a turn is ended

useBulkApi.name: Use experimental Visioner APIs
useBulkApi.hint: These APIs are under development. Use at your own risk

hideTokens.name: Hide selected tokens
hideTokens.hint: Toggle visibility off and set initiative to stealth for the selected tokens

hideLoot.name: Hide all foundry-hidden loot tokens
hideLoot.hint: PF2e Visioner only. Use the visibility manager to set all foundry-hidden loot tokens as hidden to the current party

panZoomToCombat.name: Pan/Zoom to combat
panZoomToCombat.hint: When combat starts, pan/zoom the camera to fit observed and hidden combatants for controlled tokens. Will ignore any foundry-hidden, undetected, or unnoticed combatants

notifications.noSocketLib: PF2e Avoid Notice needs socketlib module to be active in order to pan/zoom to combat. Please activate it.

schema.name: Schema Version
schema.hint: Set this to a previous version to force a data migration from the specified version to the current version
